ValidationRule.description: Validation that will force user to enter a QTY for Vacuum Regulator field if the Vacuum regulator field if populated. The Quantity of Vacuum Regulator should be derived from the Qty of Pump Kit.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(RecordType.Name=='7000 Series', IF(ISPICKVAL(FS_Vacuum_Regulator__c, '46409 : Regulator Vacuum (Series 7000)'),IF(AND( ISBLANK(FS_Vacuum_Regulator_QTY__c) , ISBLANK(FS_Eq_Pump_Kit_QTY__c) ), false, IF(AND( ISBLANK(FS_Vacuum_Regulator_QTY__c) , NOT(ISBLANK(FS_Eq_Pump_Kit_QTY__c))), true, IF(FS_Vacuum_Regulator_QTY__c != FS_Eq_Pump_Kit_QTY__c, true, false) ) ),false), false) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, $Label.Exclude_User))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Quantity of Vacuum Regulator should be same as Quantity of Pump Kit.
